entry.title: Dawn - 175 Bloom Gelatin - 5 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dawn
Type: BAKING
Price: 129.99

Dawn - Gelatine 175 Bloom - 5 Kg -00830283

Unflavored gelatin is an odorless, tasteless and colorless thickening agent, which when dissolved in cold water, and heated and then cooled, forms a jelly. Certain fresh fruits contain enzymes that break down the gelatin, such as figs, pineapple, kiwi, papaya, mango, and guava.

The purest form of neutral gelatin available with a strong set. Use to make molds, aspics, fondants icing, chaud/froid (jelled white sauce to glaze hams, turkeys, etc.) and desserts.

entry.title: Ewald - Gelatine Gold Leaf Box - 1 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ewald
Type: BAKING
Price: 63.99

Ewald - Gelatine Gold Leaf Box - 1 Kg

The gelatin choice of chefs, leaf gelatin is easy to use and measure in the kitchen. This odorless, tasteless thickening agent forms a gel when combined with liquid and heat. Leaf gelatin melts more slowly than granular gelatin but produces a gel of greater clarity. Gold leaf gelatin sets firm (200 Bloom strength) and is ideal in the preparation of jellies, mousses, marshmallows, sweet or savory bavarois and aspics. This product is derived from beef and pork products.

entry.title: Dr Oetker - White Gelatine Sheets - 10 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr Oetker
Type: BAKING
Price: 3.29

Dr Oetker - White Gelatine Sheets 6 Ct - 10 g

The purest form of neutral gelatin available with a strong set. Use to make molds, aspics, fondants icing, chaud/froid (jelled white sauce to glaze hams, turkeys, etc.) and desserts. Perfect to top and seal homemade pâtés. 6 gelatin sheets are sufficient for 2 cups (500ml) of liquid. Basic Directions: Soften the required number of gelatin sheets individually in cold water (about 5 minutes). Remove gelatin sheets from water, and drain. Following either the "hot" or "cold" preparation directions below.  Hot Preparation: Heat the liquid to be set. Add drained gelatin sheets. Stir unit gelatin sheets are dissolved. Cold Preparation: In a small saucepan, over low heat, gently stir gelatin sheets until completely dissolved. Fold into recipe, before gelatin begins to set. Chill recipe until set (about 2 hours). Tip: Fresh kiwi, pineapple, papaya and figs are not suitable for use with gelatin. Ingredient: pure gelatin

entry.title: JELLO - Orange Instant Pudding - 1 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: JELLO
Type: BAKING
Price: 9.99

JELLO - Orange Instant Pudding - 1 Kg

Quickly and easily prepare large batches of pudding with this instant cream pudding mix. Ideal for high-volume operators, this pudding mix delivers high-performing results with consistency in taste, color, and texture. It is great for offering as a popular dessert option in your buffet, cafeteria, or catered event. Or, use as an ingredient to create pudding pies and layered desserts like trifles and eclair cakes. However the pudding served, its smooth, creamy texture and rich cream taste are sure to please!

Extremely easy to prepare, this instant pudding mix helps reduce preparation time in your busy kitchen or catered event without sacrificing on quality. Pour contents in to the mixing bowl and after preparing into serving dishes and let it stand 10 minutes, or until set, before adding toppings. Alternatively, pour the contents of the mixing bowl into cooled, baked pie shells to use as a pie filling and let it stand for 30 minutes, or until set, before adding any toppings.

entry.title: Puratos - Cremyvit Classic Custard Cream Mix - 25 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Puratos
Type: BAKING
Price: 189.99

Puratos - Cremyvit Classic Custard Cream Mix - 25 Kg

There is no need to sacrifice quality for speed when making custard cream. Simply use Cremvit. Cremyvit is a range of deliciously smooth and creamy custard cream mixes that take only moments to prepare – just add water!

Cremyvit mixes are easy to use and quick to prepare. Just add cold water, whip, and the custard creams are ready, possessing all the taste and firm texture that consumers are looking for. Not only are they bake and freeze/thaw stable, but they can be used in a wide range of finished products and applications including: baked products like tarts, danish pastries and pies, as filling in éclairs and viennoiserie, in slices such as cremeschnitte, and in glorious combination with dairy or vegetable cream.
